00014 #include "analyzer.h"
00015 #include "signalgenerator.h"
00016 #include "ui_signalgeneratorform.h"
00017 #include <QStatusBar>
00018 
00019 XSG::XSG(const char *name, bool runtime,
00020          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00021          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00022          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00023          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00024     : XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00025       m_freq(create<XDoubleNode>("Freq", true, "%.13g")),
00026       m_oLevel(create<XDoubleNode>("OutputLevel", true)),
00027       m_fmON(create<XBoolNode>("FMON", true)),
00028       m_amON(create<XBoolNode>("AMON", true)),
00029       m_form(new FrmSG(g_pFrmMain))
00030 {
00031     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00032     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("Signal Gen. Control - ") + getLabel() );
00033 
00034     m_conOLevel = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_oLevel, m_form->m_edOLevel);
00035     m_conFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freq, m_form->m_edFreq);
00036     m_conAMON = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_amON, m_form->m_ckbAMON);
00037     m_conFMON = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_fmON, m_form->m_ckbFMON);
00038       
00039     oLevel()->setUIEnabled(false);
00040     freq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00041     amON()->setUIEnabled(false);
00042     fmON()->setUIEnabled(false);
00043 }
00044 void
00045 XSG::showForms()
00046 {
00047     m_form->show();
00048     m_form->raise();
00049 }
00050 
00051 void
00052 XSG::start()
00053 {
00054     m_oLevel->setUIEnabled(true);
00055     m_freq->setUIEnabled(true);
00056     m_amON->setUIEnabled(true);
00057     m_fmON->setUIEnabled(true);
00058     
00059     m_lsnOLevel = oLevel()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00060         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onOLevelChanged);
00061     m_lsnAMON = amON()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00062         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onAMONChanged);
00063     m_lsnFMON = fmON()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00064         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onFMONChanged);
00065     m_lsnFreq = freq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00066         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onFreqChanged);
00067 }
00068 void
00069 XSG::stop()
00070 {        
00071     m_oLevel->setUIEnabled(false);
00072     m_freq->setUIEnabled(false);
00073     m_amON->setUIEnabled(false);
00074     m_fmON->setUIEnabled(false);
00075     
00076     m_lsnOLevel.reset();
00077     m_lsnAMON.reset();
00078     m_lsnFMON.reset();
00079     m_lsnFreq.reset();
00080 
00081     afterStop();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void
00085 XSG::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00086 {
00087     m_freqRecorded = pop<double>();
00088 }
00089 void
00090 XSG::visualize()
00091 {
00092     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00093     //! record is read-locked
00094 }
00095 void
00096 XSG::onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00097 {
00098     double _freq = *freq();
00099     if(_freq <= 0) {
00100         gErrPrint(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Positive Value Needed."));
00101         return;
00102     }
00103     XTime time_awared(XTime::now());
00104     changeFreq(_freq);
00105     clearRaw();
00106     push(_freq);
00107     finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00108 }
